scrape.title: Import Data from JYSK.cz
scrape.description: This function will download and update the global list of articles directly from the public JYSK.cz website.
scrape.warning: This process may take several minutes and can temporarily load the system. Please run it only when necessary.
scrape.success: Import completed successfully. Found and saved {{count}} articles.
scrape.error: An error occurred during data import: {{message}}

common.tutorialStep1Content: This is a quick guide to the basic features of the application.
common.tutorialStep2Content: On the main page, you can search for any article by its number to find its exact location in the warehouse.
common.tutorialStep3Content: In the 'Rack Management' section, you can create and edit warehouse locations for your store.
common.tutorialStep4Content: The 'Mass Add' feature allows you to quickly stock multiple articles to a single warehouse location using a scanner or manual entry.
common.tutorialStep5Content: As an administrator, you can add and manage users and their roles in 'Site Management'.
common.tutorialStep6Content: In 'Site Management', you can also manage stores and assign them default sets of articles.
common.tutorialStep7Content: In 'Site Management', you have access to the activity log, where you can see all events in the application.

adminFaq.adminTutorialsDescription: Browse tutorials and FAQs specific to system administration.
adminFaq.siteDashboardOverviewContent: The site management dashboard provides quick statistics on users, stores, articles, and racks. You can also see graphical overviews here.
adminFaq.storeManagementContent: In the 'Store Management' tab, you can add, edit, and delete stores. When adding a new store, you can automatically upload the default set of global articles.
adminFaq.userManagementContent: In the 'User Management' tab, you can manage all system users, approve new registrations, and change their roles and permissions.
adminFaq.globalArticleManagementContent: Global articles serve as a template for new stores. You can manage them in the 'Article Management' section on the main page if you are logged in as an administrator.
adminFaq.helpPostManagementContent: Create and manage articles in the help center. You can target articles to all users or only to administrators.
adminFaq.logViewerContent: The log viewer records all important actions in the system. You can filter records by type, store, or user.
adminFaq.exportDataContent: This feature allows you to export key data (users, stores, articles, racks) in CSV or JSON format for further processing or backup.
adminFaq.copyArticlesContent: The 'Copy Articles' feature in the store management section allows you to copy the complete list of articles from one store to another, which facilitates setting up new stores.

faq.globalSearchTitle: How do I find an article in the warehouse?
faq.globalSearchContent: On the main page, enter the article number into the search field. The system will immediately show you its exact location – rack, shelf, and store.
faq.barcodeScannerTitle: How does the barcode scanner work?
faq.barcodeScannerContent: Click the 'Scan Code' button. Allow camera access and point it at the article's barcode. The application will automatically recognize the code and search for the article.
faq.massAddArticlesTitle: How can I quickly stock multiple articles?
faq.massAddArticlesContent: Use the 'Mass Add' feature. First, lock the target shelf, and then you can scan barcodes or enter article numbers manually. When finished, save everything at once.
faq.articleManagementContent: In the 'Article Management' section, you can add new articles, edit their details (name, status, quantity), or delete them. You can also generate QR codes for printing here.
faq.rackManagementContent: In the 'Rack Management' section, you can create new racks and define the number and description of their shelves. Each rack is assigned to your store.
faq.changePasswordTitle: How can I change my password?
faq.changePasswordContent: In your account settings (gear icon), you will find the 'Change Password' option. Enter your new password and confirm it.
faq.themeLanguageTitle: Can I change the theme or language?
faq.themeLanguageContent: Yes, in the top right corner, you will find icons to change the color scheme (light/dark) and to select a language (Czech, English, Slovak).
faq.externalLinksTitle: How do I get to MyJysk or Storefront?
faq.externalLinksContent: On the main page, you will find quick links to MyJysk and Storefront for easy access to other systems.
faq.lowStockAlertsTitle: What do the low stock alerts mean?
faq.lowStockAlertsContent: These alerts appear on the main page if the quantity of any article drops below the minimum level you have set.
faq.barcodeGeneratorTitle: What is the barcode generator for?
faq.barcodeGeneratorContent: For each article in article management, you can generate a QR code that you can print and stick on the shelf for easy and fast scanning.
